TITLE: Software Developer
MACHINE_LEARNING: Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence Lover!
ANGULAR_DESC: TypeScript-based open-source front-end web application platform led by the Angular Team at Google and by a community of individuals and corporations
SASS_DESC: Sass is a preprocessor scripting language that is interpreted or compiled into Cascading Style Sheets (CSS).
FLASK_DESC: Flask is a micro web framework (BACK-END) written in Python and based on the Werkzeug toolkit and Jinja2 template engine.
ML_DESC: Machine learning is a field of computer science that uses statistical techniques to give computer systems the ability to "learn" with data, without being explicitly programmed
SWIFT_DESC: Swift is a robust and intuitive programming language created by Apple for building apps for iOS, Mac, Apple TV, and Apple Watch.
